spawnanimations.midnightconfig.title: Spawn Animations Configuration
spawnanimations.midnightconfig.configure: §dℹ Info:§r§f To configure this data pack on a world-to-world basis,
join a world and execute the command §o/function spawnanimations:settings§r.
spawnanimations.midnightconfig.info: §dℹ Info:§r§f These settings will be applied globally to all worlds.
spawnanimations.midnightconfig.info2: Please make sure to rejoin any world for the global settings to take effect.
spawnanimations.midnightconfig.activatio:
Default: §a20 blocks§f
Mobs closer to a player than this value will play the animation.
Setting this to 0 will use the world-specific value.

Default: §aClassic§f
§nClassic§r: Out of range mobs will stay hidden until a player is in range
§nVanilla§r: Out of range mobs will spawn normally
spawnanimations.midnightconfig.hide_worn:
Default: §aYes§f
If enabled, stores the worn armor and tools in the feet and leggings slot of a hidden entity.
§6⚠ Note: This may impact worn armor and tool drop rates inside farms.
spawnanimations.midnightconfig.play_anim: Play block break animation on unsupported blocks

Default: §aYes§f
If enabled, plays a block breaking animation even on blocks that are not hard-coded into the data pack.
§6⚠ Note: This could lead to unwanted block updates.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.spawnanimatio: Hostile mobs dig out of the ground or poof into existence when they spawn!
